article.title: Novela ❤️ Gatsby.js
article.author: Mario Bašić
article.excerpt: Novela makes it easy to start publishing beautiful articles and stories with Gatsby.js.

authors.bio: Full stack developer from Croatia, specialized in building web & mobile applications. Author of the book: “A Collection of Laravel Tutorials”, creator of open-source projects, and a father.
authors.name: Mario Bašić
